items.sentence: Tom\'s friends were very kind when he lost his job.
I\'ve been dyeing my hair for the last three years.
I\'ve been friends with Tom since we were children.
I\'ve been living in Boston for almost three years.
Tom doesn\'t think Mary is cut out to be a teacher.
I\'d have stopped doing that if you\'d asked me to.
Tom, Mary, John and Alice are all in the classroom.
Tom started learning French when he was very young.
Tom started talking as soon as he entered the room.
A taxi from the airport costs about thirty dollars.
